subject: Football
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: Reggie Bush apparently reached a settlement with a sports marketer trying to recoup $300,000 in cash and gifts he says Bush and his family accepted while Bush was playing at U.S.C.
snippet: Reggie Bush apparently reached a settlement with a sports marketer trying to recoup $300,000 in cash and gifts he says Bush and his family accepted while Bush was playing at U.S.C.
